name: Backwarp (MAGES Institute of Excellence)
description:
An Endless runner that can move backwards? That's right!! Backwarp is a one-button game inspired by a science exhibition and the movie Tenet. Play as an unstable particle passing through a warp hole across the universe. Watch out for other atoms and beware, you can only move forwards or backwards.

For Voodoo Game Competition 2021 #runner #hypercasual

Credits

  • Game Development and Programming: Ian Ngoh
  • Sound Design: Ian Ngoh

Assets Used

  • Dynamic Space Background Lite - DinV Studio
  • PowerUp Particles - MHLab
MAGES Institute of Excellence

BackWarp was developed over a 3-week period by DGT Student Ian Ngoh as part of the Mobile Game Development Module.
